name: Test Magnets
description:
In the depths of a dark and twisted laboratory, two groups of magnets find themselves trapped in a deadly experiment conducted by an evil scientist. 

They must compete against each other to collect more fellow magnets in order to grow stronger. 

With every magnet they collect, they edge closer to victory, but only one can emerge victorious. The magnets must use their magnetic powers to outsmart their opponent, either by shooting their fellow magnets or forcing them to collide with the walls of the experiment. Only the strongest will remain in this intense game of survival.

Designers: Neta Feldman, Shahar Amor

Developers: Nevo Gat, Rehuben Hova,  Yair Maryles
